amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Office of the Secretary of Transportation; for IRS tax enforcement; and for the Community Development Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding in the bill by $38 million for tax enforcement efforts at the IRS and to increase funding for CDBG accounts by $67.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Knollenberg amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
